projects.title: Super-Learn
projects.caption: Poly Capstone Project - Gamified Learning Platform. By Students, For Students.
projects.desc:
Gamified Learning Platform designed to make learning fun for polytechnic students.
Inspired by learning management systems such as Blackboard, MeL, and Brightspace.
